first_para: Brian Arthur Roland Binley (born 1 April 1942) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Northampton South from 2005 to 2015.

full.extract: Brian Arthur Roland Binley (born 1 April 1942) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Northampton South from 2005 to 2015.
full.title: Brian Binley
